headline: Evaluating Lantronix (LTRX) Valuation After New Safe Pro Edge AI Threat Detection Agreement
summary: Why the Lantronix and Safe Pro Agreement Matters for Stock Watchers Lantronix (LTRX) recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding and Master Services Agreement with Safe Pro Group to co-develop Qualcomm based edge AI solutions for real time threat detection in drones and unmanned systems. The collaboration pairs Lantronix hardware with Safe Pro’s Object Threat Detection software and targets defense and security uses that rely on on device processing without constant cloud connectivity. See...
